#summary This page contains information about the Fusion Charts libraries and licensing.

= Introduction =
Fusion charts library is available in two distinct ways:

    * <a href="http://www.fusioncharts.com/free/">Fusion Charts Free</a> - Open source and free 
    * <a href="http://www.fusioncharts.com/">Fusion Charts V3</a> - Enterprise version Link

The open source version is distributed with a GPL license, while the enterprise version is proprietary.
